enb_long_title: Fortieth session of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC-40)
sentences: This session (11-14 October 2010, Busan, Republic of Korea) addressed the recommendations of the IAC Review.
The Panel adopted a number of decisions in this regard, including on the treatment of gray literature and uncertainty, and on a process to address errors in previous reports.
For recommendations requiring further examination, the Panel established task groups on processes and procedures, communications, COI policy, and governance and management.
The Panel also accepted a revised outline for the AR5 SYR.
